document_data.name: Ildmane
document_data.mainbody: '''Ildmane''' was a [[fire giant]] who, together with her husband [[Okssort]], led an attack on [[Triboar]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Okssort and Ildmane went in search of pieces of the ''[[Vonindod]]'' under the orders of [[Zalto|Duke Zalto]]. They led a giant contingent to Triboar, the town that stood over the site of an ancient great battle between [[giant]]s and [[dragon]]s. However, they were defeated by a band of adventurers.
